# Basic usage with default key file
python rsa_lab5.py

# Specifying a particular key file
python rsa_lab5.py --key path/to/key_params.txt

# Providing the ciphertext directly
python rsa_lab5.py --ciphertext 

# Verifying the decryption by re-encrypting
python rsa_lab5.py --verify

# Saving the decryption results to a file
python rsa_lab5.py --save results.json

# Complete example with all options
python rsa_lab5.py --key key.txt --ciphertext  --verify --save results.json
